documentation.text:
@title Pool
 @dev A library which provides the Vault data struct and associated functions.

@dev Gets the total amount of assets deposited in the vault.
 @return the total assets.

@dev Gets the token that the vault accepts.
 @return the accepted token.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (contract IDetailedERC20)

documentation.text:
@dev Deposits funds from the caller into the vault.
 @param _amount the amount of funds to deposit.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (contract IDetailedERC20)

documentation.text: @dev Deposits the entire token balance of the caller into the vault.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (contract IDetailedERC20)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (contract IDetailedERC20)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev Withdraw all the deposited funds from the vault.
 @param _recipient the account to withdraw the tokens to.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev Harvests yield from the vault.
 @param _recipient the account to withdraw the harvested yield to.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct VaultWithIndirection.Data storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Gets the number of elements in the list.
 @return the number of elements.
